{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AeroGarden |model=1006 |revision=70-BSS |fcc_date=09/06/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=IoT |fcc_id=2AJNO1006 |pwr_v=120 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_ac_hz=60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88MC200;M, 88MC200-NAP2, YPM27800W, 1702 A1P, TW; |wi1_module=SM008A PA1.1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8801 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} {{TagLine|AeroGarden Harvest Elite Wi-Fi}}
This "Elite" version has a stainless steel appearance. The [[AeroGarden 100661-BLK]] ''Aerogarden Harvest Wi-Fi'' is internally identical but has a black exterior.
"QT-K008-V1.1 2017.07.01" is silkscreened on a board in the FCC photos.
"SM008A PA1.1 2015-06-16" is silkscreened on the Wi-Fi module in the FCC photos.
